name: boilerplate-cypress-lookout
description: This is a frontend testing framework

scripts.delete: rm -rf ./cypress/reports && rm -rf ./cypress/videos && rm -rf mochawesome-report && rm -rf ./cypress/screenshots && rm -rf e2eReport.html
scripts.e2e: npm run delete && ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --spec cypress/integration/web_e2e/*.js && ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --spec cypress/integration/api_e2e/*.js
scripts.generateFinalReport: npm run merge && npm run generateMochawesomeReport
scripts.web: npm run delete && npm run webTest || npm run generateFinalReport && npm run generateFinalReport
scripts.api: npm run delete && npm run apiTest || npm run generateFinalReport && npm run generateFinalReport
scripts.all: npm run delete && npm run e2e || npm run generateFinalReport && npm run generateFinalReport

author: Subrato Sarkar
